snippet: Suicide bombers killed at least 18 people in three dawn attacks, including in a mosque in the northeastern town of Damaturu.
abstract: Three suicide bomb attacks kill 18 people in northeastern Nigeria, while Nigerian troops kill 100 members of Islamic extremist group Boko Haram after insurgents attack military camp.
lead_paragraph: Suicide bombers killed at least 18 people in three dawn attacks, including in a mosque in the northeastern town of Damaturu.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Blasts Kill at Least 18 People
headline.main: Nigeria: Blasts Kill at Least 18 People
